Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: EduSMS school management platform

Full-stack multi-tenant school management SaaS with:
- Backend: FastAPI + Supabase \(auth, database, storage\)
- Frontend: Next.js 16 + shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS
- Role-based access \(system admin, principal, teacher, office admin, parent, student\)
- Docker and CI/CD configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
